website_summaries.verdict: Whether you anticipate having to roll your TV cart over a carpet or from hard floors to carpeted areas, the heavy-duty casters on this option are up to the job.
pros: Commercial grade steel delivers extra stability for flat screen TV’s weighing up to 100 lbs
Compatible with VESA patterns 600-400mm and under
Robust caster wheels roll seamlessly from surface to surface and lock into place for fixed use
cons: Plastic AV shelf feels a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Same as Kanto
customer_reviews.text: This is the same exact product as the Kanto MTM65. Except about 50 dollars less when I bought it. How do I know? No instructions were sent with my stand. (-1 star) So I searched the net for pdf instructions. There is no such thing. And barely a website for this company. However, I looked up Kanto, watched one of their videos on how to put their model together. It was the exact same thing with the same parts. Once I figured out how to put this stand together I have no complaints with it. Seems solid enough so far.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Wow.. couldn't be worse
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product from Amazon as a NEW product and received a box that was obviously opened before. When I opened to box to reveal the contents, I found a box missing more parts than it came with. Box came with a grand total of 6 parts. That includes 1 of 4 wheels. Box was missing 3 wheels, ALL documentation. ALL fastener hardware, telescoping poles, TV brackets, AV Shelf, Media Shelf and countless other parts. This is the worst scenario I've ever seen and for Amazon to let this even leave their warehouse is ridiculous at best.
customer_reviews.author: Belacyrf

customer_reviews.title: The Cart is very sturdy, with good, ball bearing, lockable wheels.
customer_reviews.text: The Rolling TV Cart is a good, well designed, sturdy TV Cart. Easily assembled. The wheels are all ball bearing making it easier to move around. We will use the cart on our screen enclosed, swimming pool lanai at the table and chairs area, safely away from poolside. The cart makes it easy to use a TV during nice weather to watch sports and other TV events. The cart gives us the mobility to move the TV inside during inclement weather or use it in guest bedrooms and our kitchen when desired. We are especially pleased the cart is stable with locking wheels giving us the ability to use it safely and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Scott

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit, surprisingly good casters
customer_reviews.text: Objectively, this things does just about what I wanted - holds my secondary heavy TV and makes it easy to move around. It seems very sturdy, was generally easy to put together (by myself), and the casters aren't the typical cheap plastic garbage most things seem to come with. I will say that there is no good reason that the tray is made of plastic. The rest of the unit is aluminum - including the (somewhat flimsy and very annoying mount arms for the tray). The tray should also have been aluminum for added sturdiness. Instead they used cheap, finger-print prone plastic.
customer_reviews.author: AccidentalWisdom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rolling TV Mounting Stand!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! This TV Mount was easy to put together and is sturdy. I bought it for my outdoor patio for a 40" Flat Screen. It is perfect and it holds the Direct TV box on the shelf. It is perfect for when the weather turns nasty I just unlock the wheels and roll it into the house. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, incorrect hardware.
customer_reviews.text: First things first, we've hung the TV, and it's great. My biggest gripe is that this is a universal stand, and the hardware they sent did not suffice to connect the brackets to the TV. The D-1 screws were the correct gauge, but does not reach the threads through the spacers provided. For reference, we got the Samsung UN48J5200 48-Inch 1080p.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one based on the reviews and I was not disappointed when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stand for our church to have a TV we could roll around between classrooms. I looked at many different brands online and most were way out of our price range. I bought this one based on the reviews and I was not disappointed when it arrived. The materials are very solid and it only took about 1 hour to put together. The stand is very sturdy and holds our older 47" plasma steady and secure. the quality castors do not seem cheap and roll very well. The base is heavy and allows for the cart to not tip. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Razor73

customer_reviews.title: Best. Idea. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Got this and 40-something? LED for my son's 16th. Best. Idea. Ever!! It doesn't clutter his room, has a shelf for PS4 (he bought himself) and then another shelf for cable-box, Apple TV, display shelf, whatevs. Just zip-tie a cool braided extension cord (everything is plugged into) and then he can roll it around his room (and house!). We can bring it to the tv room and play single player online PS4 games together (before we were limited to split screen or separate rooms). We don't have any stairs to deal with. All the details are to maybe help show diversity of use!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the concept of a rolling mount and this product really delivered. It only took about 30 minutes to assemble the unit and mount my 10+ year-old 42" plasma (which is a heavy BEAST) and the unit is still steady and easy to move around. I like being able to hide my cables in the vertical supports. The shelf is sturdy enough to hold my DirecTV box although its the most tedious part of the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: J Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: not so universal - wouldn't fit my 50 inch plasma
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 50" Panasonic TH50-PHD8UK Plasma. This is an older monitor but don't be fooled - even many years later I still find it a more enjoyable picture than many new TVs. Anyway, it appears the mounting plate is ~60mm too narrow to accommodate my TV. Very frustrating as I wasted a couple hours getting it unpacked and set up, and I don't imagine returning it will be much easier. I'm not sure what it would have cost them to make the plate that little bit wider but I can't imagine it would've been much.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Klein

customer_reviews.title: Functional and very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, the ease of movement and the functionality. The only problem that I had was on assembly....one of the four screws in the base bottom would NOT line up no matter how hard we tried. However, it IS very solid, even without the one screw that just wouldn't be conquered...otherwise, I would have given the full 5 stars. It's a great design and perfect for wireless units. For me, this is the perfect solution to not really needing a TV in every room or extra charges for extra units from the cable folks. It will pay for itself in what I won't have to pay when I want to watch in another room...and that doesn't happen often.
customer_reviews.author: StarCastle

customer_reviews.title: ... this with TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017) it's great
customer_reviews.text: got this with TCL 49S405 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017) it's great! very durable! note: we had a little drilling done on one of the holes to get the TV mounted completely but no biggy it's made very sturdy, feels very durable and adjusts to your viewing height with ease! if you need a TV stand for your TV 40-65inches and weights less than 100lbs, get this!
customer_reviews.author: Coney

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Cart!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a TV cart on which to attach a unique antique cabinet built by my Grandfather. This cart is perfect! It's the right dimensions for my purpose and very sturdy. It was simple and easy to assemble by myself. Love having the cords channeled through the pipes. I bungee corded my DVD player to the mini shelf on top and use the component shelf for a display of a special crystal and porcelain collection. I will acquire some pipe clamps to mount my Grandfather's cabinet below the component shelf. This TV cart is sturdy, versatile, mobile, and attractive. I'm very pleased with it and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: soloangel58

customer_reviews.title: Maneuverability and durability is what sold me on this TV stand.
customer_reviews.text: Since we have a fireplace we wanted to be able to move the TV to the side of the room. Since it will be moved often good wheels and a sturdy frame were important. This stand easily support or 55" high definition TV with the soundbar adapted to fit under the TV. I made custom mounting brackets and used the TV foot mounting holes to suspend it.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we rearranged our living room/kitchen and didn't want the TV to dominate the space. By moving it to a rolling stand, we now move it to the part of the room we need (in the kitchen when cooking or eating there, in the living room for watching a game, at the table when eating, etc). When not in use we just roll it into the corner and it looks like it's meant to live there. LOVE THIS THING! I was super easy to assemble. We got some Monkey Cord to bundle all the cables together behind it and it looks great. Honestly, just love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Marrero @WhatTheMiguel

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, I was shocked especially since the price for this rolling stand was so reasonable. All parts fit together easily, and had excellent finish. The assembly was so logical that I didn't really have to refer to the manual much at all. Recommended! This rolling stand is holding a 49" Sony LED TV with ease. Does not feel "tippy" in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Mounting screws too short.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv cart so I could mount a Samsung curve tv. The hardware that came with the cart to mount the tv was too short. I had to order the proper sized hardware from another vender. 1 kit and I only used 2 appropriate sized screws, and it was mounted. I love the cart, maybe the short screws were for other flat screen tv’s, not the curve.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE R. GOOCH

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick and easy. It’s very solid and functional. Wheels lock, cables go inside the vertical tubes, and shelf is a good size. I put at 58” Samsung on this together with an Apple TV and use this to stream/mirror video from my Apple products. Entire rig cost less than $1k and replaced a $7k projector and bulky screen. I did quite a bit of research before buying and think this is the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Armi

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I was totally wrong
customer_reviews.text: Was afraid that won't handle my 65 inch curved Samsung Tv.Fortunately I was totally wrong.Easy to assemble solid construction gives me full release from any concerns.Bought it on sale as temporary solution but eventually ended up keeping it.Thanks to solid wheels found it very movable.Very recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: igor wypijewski

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a church family center. Assembled it and attached a 65" TV. It was much easier to move and maneuver than I had anticipated. The ability to raise and lower the height makes it easy to add some stability if it is moved over less-than-perfect surfaces, but even at an average height it rolls easily and feels stable.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great item good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this stand for our church, it is very easy to assemble and appears to be a great value at 120 dollars. Went together in about 20 mins only needed a second person to lift the 55 inch tv on to the rails. Stable rolling as long as you take your time and watch any thresholds. Will purchase another as this allows us to use tvs in multiple classrooms and lobby saving hundreds of dollars on tvs that would only be used a few weeks a year in some cases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the perfectly pampered person!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and easily assembled stand for larger sized televisions. The base is on rollers and very well balanced. The televisions are securely attached and can be adjusted up and down. This is important for different viewers. It has sturdy shelves for a cable/satellite boxes as well as DVD/DVR components..Everybody who sees the stand comment on on it in a positive. They ask where I got it and ask me to send them the link I know of two people who asked to borrow my computer to order one for their homes. I can't think of how you could improve the product. For me, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Solid
customer_reviews.text: So the clamps on the casters either lock too tight to undo, or just nihht tight enough to really hold. The weak point however is the plastic shelf. The rest of this is built like a tank. Occasionally, you do have to tighten everything, but it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry P.

customer_reviews.title: It's Really Sturdy When You Put It Together Correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I needed another rolling TV cart at the church where I work so after reading the reviews for the Mount Factory stand I ordered one. I put it together and before I put the 55" TV on it I thought that the upright posts were awfully wobbly. So just for grins I did open the assembly instructions and found that I had left off two bolts in the bottom of the uprights! Once I corrected it the stand is very sturdy. And for the price I would easily recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Nice fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Nice fit and finish. I wish that I could adjust it a bit lower, and wish that it had tilt and rotate features, but that would be unrealistic for the price. I am using it in my home, and while its size is a bit imposing, it does not look so industrial that it is out of place. I have a 40" tv mounted on it, and all is well, but it would look more proportional with a larger screen. So much more solid than I anticipated. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Works great and its on wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a year. Love it. We keep it in one place but when we did have to move it , it was great having it on wheels. My tv is 60" flat screen. It was easy to put together. We have ours behind a old tv consol that couldn't hold weight of tv and for looks we like the way that combo works.
customer_reviews.author: SNO

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stand with Locking Wheels. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy cart for flat screen televisions or monitors. All four wheels have locking mechanisms to keep it in place once it is where you need it. The locks not only lock wheel rotation but also their ability to swivel as well. A/V tray is plastic but it seems more than sturdy enough for today's DVD players or cable boxes. Might have been nice it it offered the ability to tilt the screen but for the money it can't be beat. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: W. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality TV cart
customer_reviews.text: I used this cart for a 52" LCD TV that weighs over 75 lbs. It went together easily and seems very sturdy. I like the locking casters, it makes things very convenient. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and I'd recommend this TV cart to anyone looking to have a mobile big screen TV that is kept very secure when you want it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mobile Cart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product using Amazon prime delivery and received it the very next day. We do several marketing presentations at work that require our 55 inch flat screen TV to be mobile (both in the building and packaged up and moved to various venues around the US for trend shows). The stand is durable and on wheels. It also has a stand where a laptop or other presentation equipment can be neatly displayed and/or used. It breaks down and sets up easily. I wouldn't say its very light weight but we didn't expect it to be. 2 people can easily maneuver it. The stand fits various tv sizes and brands easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart exceed my expectations in every way. I mounted a 56" TV and Dvd player to it. Stability is great and it moves across carpet , tile and wood floors amazingly. As a matter of fact I am going to order a second one . A feature I didn't realize it has was a bracket for a camera. I don't have a use for it currently , but could see potential to use in the future. I highly recommend this product to anyone in the market for a well made and versatile TV cart.
customer_reviews.author: Will , Chagrin falls,OH

customer_reviews.title: Love it, very sturdy! Holds my 50in very well!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. I bought the tv, but didnt want to mount it on the wall,because i like to move my room around alot. Very sturdy and high enough. My 17yr old daughter and i put it together in about 30 mins to an hour. Only wish they had words to explain the instructions more. But nothing a you tube video couldnt help with. Thanks to my 17 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Etta

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product but it is missing part D2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product but it is missing part D2 which secures the bottom of the tv mount to the stand. There should be 2 but none came with it. It is a well made product but it does not feel secure without this missing part. I tried to find contact information for the company to resolve this missing part but there is NO contact information on the website. It would be 5 stars with this part but I am hesitant to use it without the proper security and it is therefore not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Arch

customer_reviews.title: Solid contruction and profesional grade unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid cart that will last a long time. The assembly directions were easy to follow, but it would be good to have another set of eyes helping to read the instructions and offer assistance with assembly. It needs to be rolled perpendicular with the direction you are moving or a bump or doorway may cause the unit to tilt. Pros: Solid construction, easy to assemble, adjustable for various size TVs and viewing height. Cons: No cord storage location (for the extension cord), If rolled width-wise, it might tip (that's true for any cart though). I would recommend this unit and will probably buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Womble

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great For Us
customer_reviews.text: This unit is just what we were needing in our conference room. It is not difficult to assemble and it is very sturdy. We mounted a 47 inch LED TV on it and it looks great. It allows us to move the TV and computer around the room when needed.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, only two flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, only two flaws. 1) missing one of four bolts that hold the screen to the cart...pretty important part. 2) the way the tray underneath is attached is a complete joke. Don't touch the tray to move things or it comes off completely, only held on by two plastics bushings that 'push' into place, no screws, etc. Also tray is plastic and the arms supporting are not as strong as one might expect given the heavy duty nature of the rest of the cart. Rolls easy, overall a darn good buy at $100, way overpriced at the original price.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Prairie

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to put together, this stand is solid. I have a 50" on there and i feel completely comfortable with it. I have never had any tipping scares or anything of the like. I also like that this stand has cord management. They have a hole that goes down the pole which makes it a bit easier to make it look cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good build quality, this is even heavier than my 50" TV, and quite easy to install. The instructions are quite clear. The only thing that may cost you some time is to find a right hole on the metal bar to put in bolts (and whether to use a big or small spacer) at the back of the TV, as there many choices, or sometimes it will be blocking way when you hang the TV on it. But it wasn't so bad. Overall absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: T Wang

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This was exactly what we needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This was exactly what we needed to mount our 40" TV in a bedroom where wall mounting wasn't an option. I was impressed by it's construction and stability when the TV is moved. Casters roll easily over berber carpet and lock down for safety. Easy to assemble and came with plenty of various hardware (screws and spacers) to customize to any TV. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SafetyGirl

customer_reviews.title: sweet. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Put the TV anywhere I want to chill in the house and out on the deck...sweet. Sturdy, quality stand.
customer_reviews.author: ATL D1RTYB1RD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, functional stand.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily and quickly. I did it solo in about 40 minutes, and that included mounting the TV. Looks great and is heavy-duty enough to inspire confidence in actually moving it around if required. The lower shelf works great to hold my sound bar and the cable management holes in back were of sufficient size to route all necessary power and audio/video/HDMI cables.
customer_reviews.author: SteveK9

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well constructed, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the over all quality of the product. All parts and fasteners fit well during a reasonably easy assembly process, and the stand is quite sturdy with a 55 Sony 4K HDTV mounted to it. An unexpected bonus: an Apple TV 4K slides nicely into an unintentional "pocket" between the two vertical support beams, keeping that component secure and out of sight. Quite pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Averna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, fit and finish!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and finish. When I opened the box It was obvious that this was a well designed and manufactured stand. Simple to erect. Upon completion and after installation of a 55" Samsung, I could not be more pleased. In my view, exceptional value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart exceeded my expectations. We got it to put our 42 inch TV on to move outside to our patio, yet to be portable to move it in when weather is bad. It is very sturdy. It rolls nicely and has brakes to keep it in place. It could definitely hold a larger TV that what we have on it with no problem. If we add a 2nd TV, we will definitely buy another one of these carts.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Stable, secure and portable.
customer_reviews.text: Using this on our 4K 55" Samsung TV. Very stable and secure. Easy to assemble with a fantastic fit and finish. Works great in our lobby as well as the trade shows that we exhibit at. Holds the TV perfectly above a table with literature on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lafrenz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased for our Church. Each holds a 43" TV and a Blu-Ray player. Easy to move to other SS rooms. Definitely recommend......
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and easily can be wheeled room to room
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble it myself in less than an hour. Anyone who can read and follow directions can do it. All you need is a screw driver. It's sturdy and easily can be wheeled room to room. I did have trouble with one step in the directions (mounting the actual tv), but with some trial and error, it worked out! I'm glad I bought this and I would recommend it, especially if you can't decide whether to put the tv in the living room or bedroom--this allows for both!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly for what I wanted it for, a ...
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly for what I wanted it for, a stand that i could move in and out of the way. Setting the stand up was a little bit cumbersome but after setup it is solid and not top heavy even with a 50in tv
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product, we just wished they had come already ...
customer_reviews.text: The rolling TV mobile carts were just what we needed for our Children's Church Ministry. It made things a lot easier for the teachers and student to be able to be able to get the lessons in a more interesting way. We were also able to put different size tvs in the different classrooms. Great product, we just wished they had come already put together. It was a little stressful for the female teachers to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to put together and convenient due to the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for the instructions. Not all that clear I did have to buy additional screws to fit my tv because the screws provided was to short.
customer_reviews.author: Crissydione

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the quality of this TV stand. Easy to put together and very well constructed. No problems or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Semtennis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easily maneuvered
customer_reviews.text: Must read directions. Easy to get piece upside down if you don’t. Great maneuvering. We use ours in a den but if we have company we can move it easily into the livingroom. Kind of ugly being all black. Would be cool if they had colors or wood grain
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased - high quality and filled the need I had
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived safely. Included instructions were easy to understand. Setup took ~1hr. Mounted a 55in LG OLED TV. Feels completely secure
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Swaney

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality cart which was very simple to assemble. We will be buying two more for another business we are opening.
customer_reviews.author: Colin C. Tawney

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Solid TV stand for money. Wheels roll smooth and cart moves around easily. Only give 4/5 on review because height isn't adjustable easily with mount for TV attached to posts. Best and probably only way to adjust height is to remove TV and loosen the bolts holding the TV mount onto the posts so that they can move slightly. Then the posts can be adjusted to desired level and tightened back up. Wire chases are nice and I was able to fit a surge strip in the bottom cavity of the stand so that there is only a single power cord coming out.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly stable
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is surprisingly stable with a 55" TV mounted on it. The wheels roll smoothly and there's space inside the supports to hide the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyNick

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand very Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Great Stand very Heavy Duty. I put it together by myself in about 30 minutes. Would have gone quicker with an extra set of hands. well built. As some one else pointed out, it does take two people to raise or lower once a tv is mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: check where you TV's plugs are
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cart-sturdy and high quality. The only problem we had with it is the TV mounts on to the base at the same place where the wires were suppose to connect. Luckily we were able to maneuver a solution. Otherwise we were super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if there were a flat wrench to tighten the wheels on the unit. Mine are still just hand tight because a normal wrench is too thick to use. Having a metal tray rather than a plastic one would be good. Other than that the product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bruce

customer_reviews.title: A Great TV Cart if your on the move...
customer_reviews.text: This TV Cart is AMAZING...well built...the ONLY downfall is that the ONLY instructions are "Pictures" ONLY... No Words...BUT, if you can build things with pictures...you'll have NO Problems...! It rolls really smooth... I would HIGHLY recommend this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I agree with all 5 stars review.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all 5 stars review. To make ease of access of this type of "wall" mount (not just this stand), users need to pre-hook-up all pig tail wires for next connection or whenever use. Such as: HDMI pig tail cable, USB pig tail cables, ... all cables to be pig tail out to ease access.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: A neat compartmentalization product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Helps my office to have mobile access on wheels. More than I wanted to pay, but competitive for the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value & recommend purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Instructions not entirely straightforward, but not difficult to put together regardless. 35 y/o woman, w/o assistance finished in under an hour - I even mounted the 55" TV on the stand w/o help (though not advisable per the instructions!).
customer_reviews.author: JamCo

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Good design and well constructed (mostly). Very stable even with a 55 inch flat screen TV attached. Only concern are the TV stand height adjustment tabs. One tab was attached properly and was was not and it popped off while putting the unit together. Couldn’t be reattached so a nut and bolt was used to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: rsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile stand
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to assemble. I did it alone and I'm just an average girl with a purple tool kit. I have very plush carpet and was concerned about the mobility but it rolls very nicely over the carpet. It's great to be able to adjust the TV for optimal viewing and yet easily get it out of the area when not in use. Very strong, durable, and stable.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Heckuva Buy
customer_reviews.text: Well built, heavy duty and stable with a Samsung 65" curved installed. We are extremely pleased with this product. Only drawback was we had to mount the TV 2" of center in order to access the RCA plugs for the Wii. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Aiton

customer_reviews.title: Functional and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The stand/cart was as described/depicted. I use it in a church to move TV and DVD from one room to another. I do wish it had come with provisions for cord management for the shelf but this was a relatively easy modification.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stand was easy for me to put together and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The stand was easy for me to put together and sturdy. It's exactly what I had hoped it would be. I'm using it in my studio front window to show a running slide show of my images and then wheel it to another location within my studio for in person sales.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our church. They work great! We use them in various settings indoors and out. They are very sturdy and the locking wheels are a nice feature. The only thing we added was some stage sandbags to ensure that they don’t fall over when we’ve got them raised up high.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble and moves nicely
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble and moves nicely. The wheel lock is quite effective. It has enough holding space on its base, and I could tie a small UPS for the tv. I haven't tried other rolling mount, but I'm pretty sure it's one of the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S

customer_reviews.title: I am giving this product a AAA+ rating. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product a AAA+ rating. The metal shelf in the 4th picture is misleading (because it was not part of this package) and this is my only complaint with this product. The quality, looks and strength of this product is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Visner

customer_reviews.title: Some modifying required
customer_reviews.text: Mounting screws were too short so had to go to Home Depot to purchase longer screws. No tilt adjustment so had to improvise by adding washers to upper mounting screws in order to get TV to not angle upward, which affects the stability of mounting. Overall, not bad but a little more engineering thought into design and assembly would make an average product extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Samsung 55"

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cart for a free-standing TV.
customer_reviews.text: Cart is very sturdy. Holds 60" LG tv with no problems. Comes with HEX wrench, you will need pliers and screwdriver to assemble. Comes with various trays to mount equipment to; I don't use those. Very simple assembly, took about 30 Min to put together. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Feather

customer_reviews.title: As it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Well, is exactly as pictured. Seems pretty heavy duty. Have an older laptop sitting on the shelf, and those older laptops tend to be heavy. I was worried about the shelf because of other reviews, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Holladay Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and rolls smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small apartment, so TV can easily move from living room to bedroom. Went together quickly, feels amazingly sturdy, and rolls nicely. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: BTV

customer_reviews.title: Very durable type heavy duty stand. Although had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable type heavy duty stand. Although had a problem with one adjustment pin being broke. So I was able to leave it at the base height which was high enough. If needed will put a screw to adjust it, rather than return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well balanced, & easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Great rolling mount that is sturdy and well balanced without having an enormous footprint. Has 4 locking casters and two shelves. Cords can be hidden inside the vertical supports. Built it on my own in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great look and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for the church and not only are these very strong and study, they look amazing!!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ODAM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV cart
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit to put the cart together, but everything needed is included and BOY is it nice! I wish this had been available (and I had known about it) years ago! Absolutely perfect! Now it needs some add-on shelves, baskets, etc. (hint, hint)
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for my 40" tv. It was easy to put together and it feels stable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Klindt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our conference room at work. Easy to assemble, sturdy, and looks very professional!! Couldn't decide between wall mount or rolling stand - glad we went with the rolling stand. I attached a surge power strip with black zip ties at the base so I'd only have one cord to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy, attractive, modern looking stands hold our 65” displays in conference room. Good wheels. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Very sturdy. Have a 60" tv on it and it moves easily and safely by myself. (on carpet!) Very happy with purchase. Took about 45-60 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Vince V

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for our church. Great quality, easy to assemble. We are using it for a 65 inch TV purchased to use at our church for Bible Study, presentations, and movies. Also came on time and well packed for shipping. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV rolling cart for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great TV rolling cart for the price, works great, easy to put together and very sturdy. Just keep in mind the bigger the TV, the more it will wobble... I used this cart with a Sharp 43 inch TV and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Not cheaply made...very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this! Ability to move our 55” TV wherever we need. Very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lensing

customer_reviews.title: Love this set up.
customer_reviews.text: This was a better option than wall mounting, now I can move it from room to room with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, exceeded my expecs, easy to assemble, top shelf could be bigger, but you can always make your own later. Great casters roll easily over all surfaces. Very stable platform. Holds my 10 year old 42" Sony easily. (Older flat screens were much heavier than new ones). One of my best online purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: DCTex

customer_reviews.title: Photography capture station
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my photography capture station. A computer and full screen attached, can roll it to any place in my studio. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Terlizzi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs, sturdy and well-built.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, rolls well with TV attached, very, VERY sturdy and has a small footprint. I assembled mine with no issues and have a 46" flatscreen on it. I wanted it specifically to place the TV high up and take up little space, and it does both well. I am using it to hold a TV for watching while I am on a bicycle stationary trainer, so I wanted the TV to be level at least with my eyes while sitting up on a bike seat. This works perfectly. Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: sluggirl

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases from amazon, bar none
customer_reviews.text: never write reviews, but after 9 months in the basement on a berber carpet(professional pad), i really love this stand. very stable for a 65 inch LG. I roll it all over without worry that the tv will tumble over. I use the plastic accessory tray to move since it is the perfect balanced height to push - pull the stand. The wheels are of high quality and very easy to roll in even deeper carpeting. one of my best purchases at amazon, bar none. worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S.

customer_reviews.title: Great mount. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The mount is very sturdy. We mounted a 60" 10 year old Sharp LCD tv on it. It rolls well. The casters are well made. We didn't use the bottom shelf as we didn't have a. Wed for it. We mounted the portable receiver on the other behind the tv in reverse with some longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: Pati Mooring

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand, I just wish the tray would stay on. It easily comes off. Otherwise, everything is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kalistoga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand for patio TV
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for a wall mount for our 48" tv. It's for our outdoor covered patio. This stand was the perfect solution. We are able to move it around, even pulling it out to be able to view from the pool. Will see how it holds up to the Florida humidity over time. But overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wine for mike

customer_reviews.title: This cart is sturdy and has nice wheels
customer_reviews.text: This cart is sturdy and has nice wheels. The television feels very secure on it. I'd like it to be taller, but I suppose it would be top heavy then. I have enjoyed having the ability to move the television around. Right now we are using it with a 42" television. Eventually plan to put a 55" on it.
customer_reviews.author: edinkdo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this TV stand. The stand is strong solid durable. It hugs tight to the wall and makes a great addition to my front room.
customer_reviews.author: jacquie michonski

customer_reviews.title: & haven't found anything this sturdy for under $275
customer_reviews.text: This cart is a professional-grade heavyweight. I've looked at other carts (assembled) in stores, & haven't found anything this sturdy for under $275. Another reviewer pointed out that the accessory shelf is plastic; most modern Blu-Ray players weigh almost nothing, so it's not a problem from my point of view. Once it's assembled it looks great, with no sharp edges, areas with rough finish, etc. I assembled the cart alone without much difficulty, but it would definitely be a quicker job if you have an assistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Easy to move. Great value and great function.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Works. Not too hard to assemble. That I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works. Not too hard to assemble. That I needed assistance at the end was my failure not the products. But you do need two people to finish assembly and mount TV. Reason it got 4/5 stars is simply because it's not really attractive, very industrial audio/visual look.
customer_reviews.author: connie moore

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this product
customer_reviews.text: This looked more sturdy than the other products and after using it I am impressed. We have three patios and move our tv to all of them. I am using a 43" tv and this moves it around with ease. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

product_meta.title: Mount Factory Rolling TV Cart Mobile TV Stand for 40-65 inch Flat Screen, LED, LCD, OLED, Plasma, Curved TV's - Universal Mount with Wheels
product_meta.description: This premium rolling cart has the ability to move your TV or monitor to any room in your home or office. This unit is designed to universally fit most LED, LCD, Plasma TVs and other flat panel displays from 40" to 65". This television mount utilizes the standard VESA patterns installed in almost all flat screen TVs with a range of 100mm x 100mm up to 600mm x 400mm. The height of the display (center of the TV) is adjustable from 40" to 60" in 2" increments. Constructed from commercial-grade, heavy-duty steel, this rolling mount is rated with a capacity up to 100 pounds. A convenient, height adjustable component shelf is made to hold a cable box, game console, DVD player, or any other similar device under 10 pounds. This movable cart is loaded with safety features such as an extra wide base measuring 33" x 29" for stability and security bolts that lock your TV in place to protect against accidental shifting. The four wheels are heavy-duty casters that roll smoothly and are built with a locking mechanism on each wheel for safety and stability. Convenient openings in the upright poles and back plate provide space to pass cables and wires through for a clean and uncluttered look. Step by step instructions will guide the simple assembly and installation process. Also included is a media top shelf that height adjustable and can support a video camera, game motion sensor, or a similar item. Certifications: RoHS, CE and ISO-9001.
feature_bullets: Universal fit and compatibility for televisions from 40 - 65 in.
Component shelf for cable box, DVD player, etc.
Ideal TV display that can move to any room in the home or office
Universal fit - fits VESA hole patterns from 100mm x 100mm to 400mm x 600mm
One piece steel base; sturdy steel frame; rated for televisions up to 100 pounds, heavy-duty locking casters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars637 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
